title: Tammy Hembrow flaunts her famous derrière in skimpy rainbow mini-shorts
text:
Tammy Hembrow has become one of the country's most famous influencers with her raunchy bikini snaps.

And on Wednesday, the 25-year-old was up to her old tricks as she flaunted her sensational physique.

Taking to Instagram, Tammy wowed her fans in a rainbow-hued crop top and matching tight mini-shorts.

So booty-ful! Tammy Hembrow, 25, (pictured) has flaunted her famous derrière in a skimpy rainbow coloured crop and mini-shorts in a clip she shared to Instagram on Wednesday

The Instagram queen showed off her thin waist in the racy activewear set, which clung to her eye-popping curves.

The blonde star then showed off her famous posterior as she did a turn in the bright and racy exercise gear.

Tammy appeared to wear blonde hair extensions for the modelling session, wearing the tresses in a fashionable knotted high pony.

'Rainbow stylin': Tammy proved she certainly wasn't shy, as she posed in the activewear

Tammy opted for a glossy makeup palette, which she paired with a smokey eye.

The Gold Coast beauty finished her makeup look with a matte lip.

Tammy kept her caption relatively short: 'Rainbow stylin.'

Oh, my! Tammy (pictured) looked toned and tanned while wearing the bright exercise gear

The busty beauty also had her ever-growing collection of tattoos on display, including a palm tree on her bicep.

The glamazon debuted her newest tattoo to Instagram on Saturday, showing a clip of herself brandishing a large black star inked behind her right ear.

'Spot the new tatt,' teased Tammy, as she pouted towards the camera in the front seat of her car.

Tatt's new! It comes after the glamazon debuted her newest tattoo on Instagram on Saturday, with her brandishing a large black star inked behind her right ear

Tatt's a lot of ink! Tammy's extensive collection of ink includes a seahorse on her upper thigh and a butterfly on her forearm

She then turned her head slightly and pulled back her ponytail to debut the bold black star design.

It's unclear whether the design holds any particular symbolic meaning for the social media sensation.

In January, Tammy revealed that she'd had a pair of angel wings tattooed on her back to represent all the 'hard times' she'd been through in recent years.

'It was a lot to go through and this was my symbol for strength... and to represent my faith,' she said, referencing her split from Reece Hawkins in 2018.
description: Tammy Hembrow has become one of the country's most famous influencers with her raunchy bikini snaps.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
